FAQ / Alpha Trion Protocols / Wave 3 / Battle Cards /

Outflank

  1. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    Can I do damage to my opponent’s characters or only my own?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 3 FAQ]
    Much like Scouting Mission, you can choose any player’s character for this card.
  2. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    What happens if I damage a non-Specialist character?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 3 FAQ]
    That character gets +2 ATK until end of turn and no cards are drawn.
  3. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    What happens if I damage my opponent’s character and it is a Specialist?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 3 FAQ]
    That character will get +2 ATK until end of turn and your opponent will draw a card.
  4. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    What happens if I choose an enemy Specialist that is wearing     Holomatter Projector or Defense Driving or has Sturdy? [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 3 FAQ]
    The ability on the card will only cause someone to draw if a Specialist is damaged this way. Cards or abilities preventing or reducing damage to 0 will not result in the character’s owner drawing a card.
